inputs.description: Valid inputs for Google Cloud template

cli-image.description: The Docker image used to run Google Cloud CLI commands

workload-identity-provider.description: Default Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate (has format projects/PROJECTNUMBER/locations/global/workloadIdentityPools/POOLID/providers/PROVIDERID)

service-account.description: Default Service Account to which impersonate with WIF authentication

environment-url.description: The default environments url (only define for static environment URLs declaration) supports late variable expansion (ex: https://%{environmentname}.gcloud.acme.com)

scripts-dir.description: Directory where Google Cloud scripts (deploy & cleanup) are located

review-project.description: Google Cloud project ID for review env

review-app-name.description: The application name for review env (only define to override default)

review-autostop-duration.description: The amount of time before GitLab will automatically stop review environments

review-environment-url.description: The review environments url (only define for static environment URLs declaration and if different from default)

review-key-file.description: Service Account key file to authenticate on review env (only define to override default)

integ-project.description: Google Cloud project ID for integration env

integ-app-name.description: The application name for integration env (only define to override default)

integ-environment-url.description: The integration environment url (only define for static environment URLs declaration and if different from default)

integ-key-file.description: Service Account key file to authenticate on integration env (only define to override default)

staging-project.description: Google Cloud project ID for staging env

staging-app-name.description: The application name for staging env (only define to override default)

staging-environment-url.description: The staging environment url (only define for static environment URLs declaration and if different from default)

staging-key-file.description: Service Account key file to authenticate on staging env (only define to override default)

prod-project.description: Google Cloud project ID for production env

prod-app-name.description: The application name for production env (only define to override default)

prod-environment-url.description: The production environment url (only define for static environment URLs declaration and if different from default)

prod-deploy-strategy.description: Defines the deployment to production strategy.

prod-key-file.description: Service Account key file to authenticate on production env (only define to override default)

oidc-aud.description: The aud claim for the JWT

oidc-provider.description: Global Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate with OpenID Connect

oidc-account.description: Global Service Account to which impersonate with OpenID Connect authentication

review-oidc-provider.description: Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate with OpenID Connect on review environment (only define to override default)

review-oidc-account.description: Service Account to which impersonate with OpenID Connect authentication on review environment

integ-oidc-provider.description: Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate with OpenID Connect on integration environment (only define to override default)

integ-oidc-account.description: Service Account to which impersonate with OpenID Connect authentication on integration environment

staging-oidc-provider.description: Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate with OpenID Connect on staging environment (only define to override default)

staging-oidc-account.description: Service Account to which impersonate with OpenID Connect authentication on staging environment

prod-oidc-provider.description: Workload Identity Provider associated with GitLab to authenticate with OpenID Connect on production environment (only define to override default)

prod-oidc-account.description: Service Account to which impersonate with OpenID Connect authentication on production environment

tbc-vault-image.description: The Vault Secrets Provider image to use

vault-oidc-aud.description: The aud claim for the JWT

vault-base-url.description: The Vault server base API url
